Reviews

A collection of in-depth reviews for some of the top DIY website builders— including Squarespace, GoDaddy, Shopify and Wix.

  • GoDaddy Review

    GoDaddy has aggressively improved their website builder over last few years— it's now a solid package.

  • Shopify Review

    Through intuitive software and innovative features, Shopify has become the best ecommerce website builder.

  • Squarespace Review: The Best Website Builder In 2021?

    Beautiful templates and outstanding features make Squarespace my most recommended website builder.

  • Webflow Review

    Webflow provides the flexibility of front-end coding without requiring you to actually code.

  • Weebly Review

    Weebly is an excellent, easy to use website builder that is also going through a transition.

  • Wix Review

    Everything you should know about choosing Wix as your website builder.
